00021 #include <iostream>
00022 #include "simulate.h"
00023 using namespace std;
00024 
00025 
00026 bool Simulate_Good(Circuit& circuit)
00027 {
00028     ifstream inputFile;
00029     ofstream outputFile;
00030     string inName;
00031     string outName;
00032     int inputval;
00033 
00034     list<Element*>::iterator innerIter;
00035 
00036     cout << "Starting simulation" << endl;
00037     cout << "Please enter the name of the file with input vectors " << endl;
00038     
00039     // Input vectors can be only 0,15,5 standing for 0,1,unknown
00040     cin >> inName;
00041     inputFile.open(inName.c_str(),ios::in);
00042     
00043 
00044     cout << "Reading input values from file " << inName <<  endl;
00045         
00046     map<string,Wire*> ::iterator iter =  (circuit.PriInputs).begin();
00047     for (;iter != (circuit.PriInputs).end(); iter++)
00048     {   
00049         if ( inputFile >> inputval && (inputval == 0 || inputval == 15 || inputval == 5) )
00050         {
00051             iter->second->value = (Value) inputval;
00052             cout << "Setting  value of " <<  iter->second->id << " to  "  << inputval <<  endl;   
00053             
00054             // If the PI has fanout, then all branches should also be set to the
00055             // same value
00056             if (iter->second->outputs.size() > 1 )
00057             {
00058                 innerIter = iter->second->outputs.begin();
00059                 for ( ;innerIter != iter->second->outputs.end();innerIter++)
00060                 {
00061 
00062                     cout << "Setting  value of branch " <<  (*innerIter)->id  << " of  stem "<<  iter->second->id << " to  "  << inputval <<  endl;   
00063                    ((Wire*) (*innerIter))->value = (Value) inputval; 
00064                 }
00065 
00066 
00067             }
00068 
00069 
00070         }
00071         else 
00072         {
00073             cout << "Unacceptable  value of " <<  iter->second->id << " is  "  << inputval <<  endl;   
00074             cout << "Exiting" << endl;
00075             cout << "Unacceptable  value of " <<  iter->second->id << " is  "  << inputval <<  endl;   
00076             exit(0);
00077         }
00078     }
00079 
00080     cout << "Accepted all inputs, now calling circuit evaluate" << endl;
00081     cout << endl << endl;
00082     
00083     Evaluate(circuit);
00084     cout << "Evaluation done. Now printing outputs" << endl;
00085     cout << "Please enter the name of the file to print output vectors " << endl;
00086     
00087     // Input vectors can be only 0,15,5 standing for 0,1,unknown
00088     cin >> outName;
00089     outputFile.open(outName.c_str(),ios::out);
00090     
00091     
00092     iter =  (circuit.PriOutputs).begin();
00093     for (;iter != (circuit.PriOutputs).end(); iter++)
00094     {
00095        outputFile << iter->second->value << endl;   
00096     }
00097 
00098 
00099     cout << endl << endl;
00100     
00101     outputFile.close();
00102     inputFile.close();
00103 
00104     return true;
00105 }
